Name: Text & Icon / Standard
Description: Default text color with highest contrast.

Name: Text & Icon / Additional
Description: Use in combination with standard text for additional text elements.

Name: Text & Icon / Inverted / Standard
Description: Standard text color inverted to be used on high contrast colors like ui/extra strong

Name: Text & Icon / Inverted / Additional
Description: Additional text color inverted to be used on high contrast colors like ui/extra strong

Name: Text & Icon / White / Standard
Description: Light text to be used on backgrounds that are dark in all modes (light & dark)

Name: Text & Icon / White / Additional
Description: Semi-Light text to be used on backgrounds that are dark in all modes (light & dark)

Name: Text & Icon / Black / Standard
Description: This text color is dark in all modes (light & dark)

Name: Text & Icon / Black / Additional
Description: This text color is dark in all modes (light & dark)

Name: Background / Canvas
Description: Use as the background for your product (app, website, etc.)

Name: Background / Canvas Subtle
Description: Use as the background for your product (app, website, etc.)

Name: Background / Backdrop
Description: Use to overlay content below dialogs to separate dialog from content below

Name: Background / Surface
Description: Use as the background of elements like cards, headers, bottom bars, etc.

Name: Background / Surface Subtle
Description: Use as the background of elements like cards, headers, bottom bars, etc.

Name: Background / Surface Highlight
Description: Use as the background of elements that should stand out highlighted sections, footer, etc.

Name: UI / Border / Pressed
Description: Use this token for borders in pressed or active state

Name: UI / State Fill / Standard
Description: For outlined and ghost elements: The standard fill is invisible / 0% opacity

Name: UI / State Fill / Hovered
Description: For outlined and ghost elements: When hovered a light, transparent fill is applied

Name: UI / State Fill / Pressed
Description: For outlined and ghost elements: When pressed or active a medium transparent fill is applied

Name: UI / State Fill / Hovered Inverted
Description: For outlined and ghost elements: When hovered a light, transparent fill is applied

Name: UI / State Fill / Pressed Inverted
Description: For outlined and ghost elements: When pressed or active a medium transparent fill is applied

Name: None
Description: Useful for elements with multiple radius values where some corners should be square

Name: Small
Description: Used for small elements like checkboxes, etc.

Name: Standard
Description: Used for our main ui elements like buttons, etc.

Name: Large
Description: Used mainly for containers like cards or dialogs

Name: Circle
Description: Used for ui elements like radio buttons or things like avatars

Name: Standard
Description: Used for ui elements like inputs, dividers, etc.

Name: Highlight
Description: E.g. use for active menu items.

Name: Raised / Standard
Description: For bigger interactable elements like cards, etc.

Name: Raised / Hover
Description: For bigger interactable elements like cards, etc.

Name: Raised / Pressed
Description: For bigger interactable elements like cards, etc.

Name: Floating / Standard
Description: For floating elements that mostly stay in a fixed position like a FAB.

Name: Floating / Hover
Description: For floating elements that mostly stay in a fixed position like a FAB.

Name: Floating / Pressed
Description: For floating elements that mostly stay in a fixed position like a FAB.

Name: Top
Description: For fixed elements that overlay the content e.g. sidebars or bottom sheets

Name: Overlay
Description: Highest level e.g. for dialogs or modals

Name: App Bar / Top / Raised
Description: Use for headers, app bar & menus on the top

Name: App Bar / Top / Flat
Description: Use for headers, app bar & menus on the top

Name: App Bar / Bottom / Raised
Description: Use for app navigation and app bars on the bottom

Name: App Bar / Bottom / Flat
Description: Use for app navigation and app bars on the bottom

Name: Line Spacing / None
Description: Use for single line in ui elements

Name: Line Spacing / Extra Tight
Description: Use for large titles like H1 or H2

Name: Line Spacing / Tight
Description: Use for large headlines like H3, etc.

Name: Line Spacing / Standard
Description: Use for most text elements like normal copy, etc.

Name: Line Spacing / Loose
Description: Use for multi line text passages with long lines.
